data.title: Welcome to Cleveland County, NC
data.text:
County Jobs

Cleveland County is a great place to work! We offer competitive wages, exceptional benefits, and work that matters.

The County is growing, industries are expanding their operations here, and new jobs are being created. This growth drives the need for a skilled, qualified workforce. In addition to private and public industries and nonprofit organizations, Cleveland County Government offers excellent career opportunities with competitive benefits.

Cleveland County Government is an eligible employer for the Federal Student Aid Public Service Loan Forgiveness (PSLF) program. For more information about PSLF, please visit: PSLF Information

To browse available positions with Cleveland County, please visit our job portal below:

AVAILABLE POSITIONS WITH CLEVELAND COUNTY

Required Workplace Posters

Get to know Cleveland County!

As a condition of employment, individuals hired by the County are required to present proof of identity and legal eligibility to work in the United States before they can begin work. To ensure the County’s commitment to serve its citizens as efficiently as possible, the County will require, as part of the pre-employment screening into all full and part time positions and PRIOR to an official offer being made for employment, a drug test to provide a drug-free environment in which to work, a criminal history check, and a driver’s license check, if applicable. Cleveland County does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, religion, age or disability in employment or the provision of services. Cleveland County is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

If you need more information about applying for a position with Cleveland County or have questions about our benefits, please contact Human Resources.
